attributes.action: Allow residential property to be purchsed by pension funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I belive the housing market would benifit if pension funds could be used to purchase resitential property, i would purchase a property and everbody i know with a similar pension would also. This can only have a positive affect,of course there will have to be safe gaurds to prevent abuse but i am sure a system can be implemented.
